name: Return To The Ranch: Operation Freedom
name_original: Return To The Ranch: Operation Freedom
description:
After the ever-merciful Queen horselover2006 removed the his blinders , and revealed to him the subjugation of his people by the Barons, our hero Augustus, Lord of Horses has waged a secret war for horsekind.

After failing to successfully blockage the Baron's trade routes in attempt force negotiations, Augustus saddled up and rallied the cavalry to take the fight to the land of the Barons.

Mount up upon your iron steed and destabilize the Baron  economy by un-stabling your equine kin!
